about_the_game:
The Steam overlay will work if enabled, but it will be hidden due to the specifications. Thank you for your understanding.

Explore the island with your unique companions across a variety of locations, including forests, deserts, volcanoes, and icebergs. And head to the top of the large tower on the island.By exploring and obtaining various items and materials, and using them to create new items, you will have an advantage when exploring.

This game is an action RPG.When exploring, try to make good use of items and equipment.If you get stuck, try gaining experience points and leveling up your character.You can gain experience points by fighting and defeating the animals on the island.Don't worry! Even if the animals on the island are defeated, they will simply return to their burrows!

  • There are 6 difficulty levels, which you can freely change. Play at your preferred difficulty level.

  • Make use of special stones that allow you to use magic when equipped.Stones may be endowed with blessings, and depending on the type of blessing, the status of the wearer will be boosted or the behavior of magic will change.

  • During your exploration, you will sometimes come across special weapons that you can use to summon new allies. If you find it, get it.

  • You can use special items to permanently strengthen your characters. Strengthen them and advance your explorations more effectively.

About the most important features

You can turn the character's standing image into a chibi character! This is a very important function, so please remember it!

Key settings

You can operate it with a keyboard or a gamepad.

In the key settings you can change the keyboard settings and gamepad settings.

The default keyboard settings are as follows.

Up button: W key

Left button: A key

Down button: S key

Right button: D key

Action button1: U key

Action button2: H key

Cancel button: J key

Decision button: K key

L button: Space key

R button: Y key

Menu button: G key

Switching button: F key

Other

Future plans

- Plan to add a function to save member formation combos(Implemented)

- Plan to add new conversation events

- Plan to add a function to autosave when resting in bed(Implemented)

- Plan to add a function to turn the autosave function on/off(Implemented)

- Plan to add a dungeon where multiple very powerful new enemies appear that can be accessed after the ending

- Plan to add multiple very powerful new bosses that can be fought after the ending

- Plan to add a mini-game that can be played after the ending (maybe)

- Plan to change the specifications so that it is possible to synthesize and craft from materials from both items in your possession and items in your storage (this is difficult to implement, so it will take some time to realize...)

The goal is for the game to have a total play time of about 20 hours

content_descriptors.notes: This game includes slightly revealing clothing.
